about_the_game:
Needs Beta Testers!!!

Join the discord and possibly redeem a free copy of the game in exchange for some feedback and testing!! there is about 50 slots for the beta. Come and let me know what you think of the game.

Description

Santa's Basement is a thrilling cooperative game that challenges you and your friends to save Christmas by saving Santa who has cursed. Join forces with your friends and embark on a magical and dangerous journey to burn the witchbags and release Santa from the curse.

With stunning graphics, dynamic gameplay, and unique challenges, Santa's Basement offers an immersive gaming experience that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

So what are you waiting for? Grab your friends, burn those bags, and save Christmas!

Gameplay

You will sneak around santa's mansion finding hexbags that you will have to burn in the basement. Hexbags will be scattered
all around the mansion and you will have to find keys to get access to all the rooms.
You will have to find medpacks to save your friends when they get caught. And fire accelerant to keep the fire burning.

Key Features


  • Unpredictable weight based AI.
  • 1-6 Multiplayer.
  • First Person gameplay with responsive movement.
  • Replayablility with randomized Key and Hexbag locations.
  • Several Difficulty levels.

Discord Server - Devblog

name: Santas Basement

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4690K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Join forces with friends to save Christmas in the cooperative game Santa's Basement.
